Class G2BeeConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.g2mobility.xbee.G2BeeConstants

  • public class G2BeeConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    G2Bee constants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ACTION_DEBUG_OFF
      Intent action that disables debugging previously enabled by ACTION_DEBUG_ON.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_DEBUG_ON
      Intent action that enables debugging.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_DISCOVER
      Intent action to discover remote XBee devices.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_EXECUTE_PARAMETER
      Intent action to execute XBee parameter.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_GET_PARAMETER
      Intent action to get XBee parameter.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_GRANT_PERMISSION
      Intent action that is called back when USB manager grants permission for a USB device.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_LIST_DEVICE
      Intent action to list XBee devices.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_SEND_DATA
      Intent action to send data to XBee device.
      static java.lang.String ACTION_SET_PARAMETER
      Intent action to set XBee parameter

      Extras "addr", "cmd" and "value" should be provided indicating the remote XBee address, the parameter and the value to set.
      static java.lang.String KEY_ADDRESS
      Extra key indicating the XBee address.
      static java.lang.String KEY_PARAMETER
      Extra key indicating the XBee parameter.
      static java.lang.String KEY_PAYLOAD
      Extra key indicating the payload data to send.
      static java.lang.String KEY_VALUE
      Extra key indicating the XBee parameter value.

      • ACTION_GRANT_PERMISSION

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_GRANT_PERMISSION
        Intent action that is called back when USB manager grants permission for a USB device.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_LIST_DEVICE

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_LIST_DEVICE
        Intent action to list XBee devices.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_DISCOVER

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_DISCOVER
        Intent action to discover remote XBee devices.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_GET_PARAMETER

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_GET_PARAMETER
        Intent action to get XBee parameter.

        Extras "addr" and "param" should be provided indicating the XBee device address and the parameter to get.

        See Also:
        KEY_ADDRESS, KEY_PARAMETER, Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_SET_PARAMETER

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SET_PARAMETER
        Intent action to set XBee parameter

        Extras "addr", "cmd" and "value" should be provided indicating the remote XBee address, the parameter and the value to set.

        See Also:
        KEY_ADDRESS, KEY_PARAMETER, KEY_VALUE, Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_EXECUTE_PARAMETER

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_EXECUTE_PARAMETER
        Intent action to execute XBee parameter.

        Extras "addr" and "param" should be provided indicating the XBee device address and the parameter to execute.

        See Also:
        KEY_ADDRESS, KEY_PARAMETER, Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_SEND_DATA

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SEND_DATA
        Intent action to send data to XBee device.

        Extras "addr" and "payload" should be provided indicating the destination XBee address and the data frame to send.

        See Also:
        KEY_ADDRESS, KEY_PAYLOAD, Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_DEBUG_ON

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_DEBUG_ON
        Intent action that enables debugging.
        See Also:
        ACTION_DEBUG_OFF, Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_DEBUG_OFF

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_DEBUG_OFF
        Intent action that disables debugging previously enabled by ACTION_DEBUG_ON.
        See Also:
        ACTION_DEBUG_ON, Constant Field Values

      • KEY_ADDRESS

        public static final java.lang.String KEY_ADDRESS
        Extra key indicating the XBee address. The format is 8 hexadecimals without space.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_PARAMETER

        public static final java.lang.String KEY_PARAMETER
        Extra key indicating the XBee parameter. The parameter is 2 characters.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_VALUE

        public static final java.lang.String KEY_VALUE
        Extra key indicating the XBee parameter value. The value is either hexadecimal or string (for "NI" only).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEY_PAYLOAD

        public static final java.lang.String KEY_PAYLOAD
        Extra key indicating the payload data to send.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
